sgvg.name: One Degree
sgvg.description: An online platform that makes it easier to find social services for anyone with online access. Currently focused on the Bay Area.
sgvg.target_outcome: More families getting access to the services they need to overcome poverty

insights.name: Google.org
insights.text: ...revolutionizing the way low-income families access poverty-fighting resources...

sgvg.name: Crisis Text Line
sgvg.description: Teenagers love to text—their thumbs pound out an average of 3,339 texts per month. Crisis Text Line turns this into a way to help teens through their hardest times: family issues, stress or suicidal thoughts. Trained counselors text back and forth with advice and resources—and, in the process, collect (anonymous) data that could lead to better policy to protect teens.
sgvg.grantee_desired_outcome: More teens getting the support they need

insights.name: Knight Foundation
insights.text: Crisis Text Line is helping to build awareness around an important issue and creating a strong tool for problem-solving

sgvg.name: CareMessage
sgvg.description: CareMessage helps clinics, hospitals, community programs and government agencies connect with at-risk patients through the use of text and voice messaging.
sgvg.target_outcome: Greater patient engagement and improved self-care for low-income patients

insights.name: Draper Richards Kaplan Foundation
insights.text: The secret sauce is that CareMessage's automated system is smart. With every interaction, the system learns about the patient's behavior and provides more personalized content

sgvg.name: The Center For Public Integrity
sgvg.description: Nonprofit, nonpartisan organization does investigations and analyses of public service, government accountability, and ethics related issues.
sgvg.target_outcome: Fewer instances of abuses of power, corruption and betrayal of public trust by powerful institutions

insights.name: Craig Newmark
insights.text: The Center does high-quality investigative reporting, vital to the future of a free country

sgvg.name: Zidisha
sgvg.description: Person to person microlending: Zidisha allows people to lend small amounts of money directly to entrepreneurs in developing countries.
sgvg.target_outcome: More affordable loans to populations in low-income countries

insights.name: Y Combinator
insights.text: Zidisha is already changing lives and transforming communities

sgvg.name: Medic Mobile
sgvg.description: Mobile and web tools that help health workers register pregnancies, track disease outbreaks, keep stock of medicines and communicate about emergencies
sgvg.target_outcome: Improved health in underserved and disconnected communities

insights.name: Skoll Foundation
insights.text: Across 20 countries, its tools support 8,000 frontline health workers and benefit approximately six million people with plans to double these numbers annually

sgvg.name: Bayes Impact
sgvg.description: Non-profit organization dedicated to solving big social problems with #datascience
sgvg.target_outcome: Improved access to world-class data science tools and experts for civic and nonprofit institutions

insights.name: Merus Capital
insights.text: We're all so focused on leveraging 'Big Data' to solve big business issues, but shouldn't we be applying some of these efforts towards finding big solutions to big social problems? First? The world needs Bayes Impact.

sgvg.name: MoneyThink
sgvg.description: Moneythink is the only movement of young people working to restore the economic health of America through financial education

insights.name: Fast Forward
insights.text: Moneythink has taken their proven in-person financial literacy training program and extended it to where people make all their financial decisions - outside the classroom.  Moneythink's mobile app engages users with their curriculum and peers for more effective results.

sgvg.name: Guidestar
sgvg.description: Guidestar's latest initiative, GuideStar 2020, will ensure free and low-cost access to enhanced streams of information that can help nonprofits run smarter and more transparently
sgvg.target_outcome: More information in the hands of donors when and where they are making decisions

insights.name: Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation
insights.text: We believe the time has come in our sector to move beyond using basic validity and transparency information to really building a robust system to share insights that drive performance

sgvg.name: Sirum
sgvg.description: Sirum saves lives by connecting unopened unexpired medications to patients in need

insights.name: Robert Wood Johnson Foundation
insights.text: SIRUM identified a barrier and turned it into a simple, sustainable solution
